increase-coverage.test-command: dotnet test --collect:'XPlat Code Coverage' --results-directory ./tests/TestResults --logger trx --logger 'console;verbosity=detailed' && find ./tests/TestResults -name 'coverage.cobertura.xml' -exec cp {} ./tests/TestResults/coverage.cobertura.xml \; && reportgenerator -reports:./tests/TestResults/coverage.cobertura.xml -targetdir:./tests/TestResults/CoverageReport -reporttypes:'Html;Cobertura' && echo 'Coverage report generated in ./tests/TestResults/CoverageReport'
